name: A Midsummer Dream: SasuSaku Visual Novel
name_original: A Midsummer Dream: SasuSaku Visual Novel
description:
Uchiha Sasuke has been granted one night and one night only to change the past. Will he be able to find his heart's desire? Or will his present change for the worse?

1. Recommend downloading the offline version for the best experience.  Check our website for details. https://sasusakunvl.carrd.co/# 

2. If the game isn't loading, please open it by another browser and try again. Chrome or Edge is recommended. 

3. Game takes time to load on browsers, please wait a few minutes for the best experience. If the game process stops, please click on the screen to push. 

4. Modifying the text speed and skip-on&off in the config menu will cause the game to crash. If you want to modify it, please confirm that you have saved data and refresh the page after the crash happened.


Disclaimer: None of the creatives attached to this project owns Naruto, Boruto, or any of the related characters. They are created and owned by Masashi Kishimoto and Shueisha.
This game is intended for entertainment purposes only and no profit is made from this work. All rights to Naruto and Boruto belong to Masashi Kishimoto and Shueisha.
本ソフトはファンが作られた同人作品です。原作者様·公式様等とは一切関係ありません。
